name: Oscilla
description: Oscilla is a unique oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its striking design featuring a red hot box body, retro console buttons, downward-facing arms and legs, and a screen displaying an adorable cat, Oscilla stands out from the crowd. This one-of-a-kind robot is not only a technological marvel but also a charming companion. With its advanced abilities and skills, it is ready to explore the digital realm and assist its club members in their endeavors.
